body: I opened one a long time ago and it has yet to be reviewed....what's going on?
body_tagged: I opened one a long time ago and it has yet to be reviewed....what's going on?
title: My Appeal...

replies.body: The staff take time to respond to appeals. How long ago was it? If it was over 3-4 days ago, I suggest bumping it.
replies.body_tagged: The staff take time to respond to appeals. How long ago was it? If it was over 3-4 days ago, I suggest bumping it.

replies.body: Seeing as the staff the issues your punishment is not all that active at this time it might take a little longer for a reply. Please be patient and wait for a response from them.
replies.body_tagged: Seeing as the staff the issues your punishment is not all that active at this time it might take a little longer for a reply. Please be patient and wait for a response from them.

replies.body: You really could have worded that better. >_<

replies.body: In case you're not aware, warnings don't count towards excessive infraction bans.
replies.body_tagged: In case you're not aware, warnings don't count towards excessive infraction bans.
